info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Luzerne County through 245 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairmount Spgs, or 12 miles north of Berwick, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Muhlenberg, Nanticoke, Slocum, Shickshinny, New Columbus, Pond Hill, Sweet Valley, Huntington Mills, Mountain Top and Pikes Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
